summary: The Wireless Speaker (SKU-ELE-WIRELE-BC4A9C) shows moderate demand forecasts for the upcoming month in Greater London. Forecasted demand is 250 units against total on-hand inventory of 450 units (WH1: 200, WH2: 150, WH3: 100) and expected inventory of 410 units (WH1: 180, WH2: 140, WH3: 90). Current inventory levels indicate an overstock situation with 210 units surplus. The item is recommended for promotion due to supplier deal availability and overstock status. Confidence level is high at 88% based on historical sales patterns and market conditions.

reasoning_steps.description: Assessed promotional opportunities and supplier conditions
reasoning_steps.insights: Supplier deal available enabling promotional pricing. Item recommended for promotion to accelerate inventory turnover and prevent obsolescence risk

external_sources_used.external_sources_description: Analysis based exclusively on internal mock data from mock-data-service.onrender.com. No external market intelligence, competitor pricing, or third-party demand signals were consulted.
